Question: Smash Mouth covered this person's "I'm a Believer" for their 2001 self-titled album.
Hints: This person was inducted into the Songwriters Hall of Fame in 1984 and into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 2011.
Long-loved in Boston, this person was invited to sing at the July 4 holiday celebration.
